modName: Upgrade weapon to do thousands of damage
summary: with this file you can upgrade weapon to kill everyone in 1 hit
descriptionHtml:
with this file you can upgrade weapon to kill everyone in 1 hit. when you activate file your smithing level will increase to 10 thousands.

Install: copy both files from archive to your skyrim/data directory. In game press ~(console) and type bat 11, to activate. type bat disable to set your smithing skill to 100. 
this is a simly file and i am sure a lot of you can do this but not everyone.
(sorry for my bad english)
author: vabshemagarikaci
